name: LoveFall
description:
Venture in to the land of Cthulhu in this action platformer. Try to journey as far down as you can to find your stolen love. 

Battle a variety of lovecraft type creatures, with a variety of weapons and try to get down as far in to the land of chaos as you can.

BEST WITH A CONTROLLER!

A- JUMP
X- SHOOT
Left stick - move and aim

Keyboard controls have issues
wasd - move and aim
Space - JUMP
Ctrl - SHOOT

Everything drawn and programmed by me
Music credit: https://bitbeak.newgrounds.com/

Known issues:
The purple bullet won't hit flying enemies.
The game is barely playable without a controller (disappointing)
